description: The Low-Density Residential Zone (R1) is intended for villa and bungalow typology and complementary public facilities as needed. R1 Zones are limited in the City of Kigali to existing consolidated areas with the objective of limiting low-density urban development and encouraging compact development.
conditional_uses: Public facilities when suggested by Public Facilities Overlay
Commercial Retail Facilities when allowed by O-C2 Overlay

lot_requirements.notes: Plots less than 300 m2 shall follow R1A regulations. Existing developments on plots larger than 500 m2 can retain their use.

building.roof_restrictions: No reflective metal roofing shall be allowed, and roof colours should blend with the surrounding landscape

development_strategies: Estate development - No gated estates allowed on developments of more than 1 ha

permitted: One sign located on the fencing wall along the front setback
signage.location_notes: Protrusion of the signage must be contained within plot boundary

parking.notes: For properties within 500m of BRT, minimum requirements may be waived

special_notes: In all R1 Zones, R1A regulations are permitted
Refer to O-C2 overlay plan and Public Facilities Overlay Plan for guidance on location of commercial and public facilities
